chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Butcher's Yard
chapters.info: Rhuarc, p. 79 (90)—Tall, broad-shouldered, blue-eyed clan chief of the Taardad Aiel. He has gray streaks in his red hair. He has two wives: Amys, a Wise One, and Lian, roofmistress of Cold Rocks Hold. Rand put him in charge of Cairhien along with Berelain. See also Amys; Lian; sur Paendrag Paeron, Berelain.
